flowContents.name: Salesforce to S3
flowContents.comments: This flow retrieves JSON data from Salesforce, splits it into individual records, applies transformations such as handling null values, converts the data into CSV format, renames the file with the desired filename and extension, and uploads it to an S3 bucket

parameters.name: SalesforceQuery
parameters.value:
SELECT 
    Id,
    Name,
    Industry,
    Website,
    NumberOfEmployees,
    AnnualRevenue
FROM Account
WHERE DAY_ONLY(CreatedDate) = 2025-10-02
  AND Owner.Username = 'divija.garg613@agentforce.com'
